= Download And Installation =

The browser is available as a WAR file and can be downloaded here:

[http://code.google.com/p/lena/downloads/list DOWNLOAD LENA]

You need to deploy the .war into a servlet container, e.g. [http://tomcat.apache.org/ Apache Tomcat].

We recomment using version 5.5.x or 6.x.
